Name: Puzzler
About the game: Stack different shapes together to get one cube. Features original gameplay more than 50 different levels 19 steam achievements relaxing background music Gameplay In the game you need to place sets of different shapes on the platform, in the way that all the shapes fit inside a bounded area of green color. All the shapes can be moved and rotated. Moving shapes is done simply by clicking and dragging the mouse.
